alert.note: Alert for Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 2:43AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Mobile County through 330 AM CDT... At 243 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Alabama Port to 4 miles southwest of Grand Bay. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Tillmans Corner, Saraland, Theodore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Grand Bay, Bayou La Batre, Creola, Dauphin Island, Semmes, Tanner Williams, I65 And I165, Coden, Mobile Regional Airport, Wilmer, I65 And AL 158 and I10 And I65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland
